attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The constant stream of immigrants has created problems associated with housing, NHS, education, traffic accidents and congestion, crime rates, prison population, welfare drainage and many more.  The country has become nothing but a sponge for spongers.  We need to restore England's values, traditions, heritage and culture and have the balls to say that it is for the good of the country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
